summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in DiscoverFilters: the Zona input is now a Select dropdown containing the specified 19 Uruguay departments plus a "Todos" option that sets zone to an empty string, and selection updates filters.zone via onFiltersChange. No backend changes are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state entries marking new feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a UI change in DiscoverFilters; updating project_state.json feature request tracking was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive summaries of many frontend files including additional UI/behavior details unrelated to the requested Zona dropdown change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request documentation/summary updates; this appears to be ancillary metadata change beyond implementing REQ-1.
